title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 10 - SPORTFISHING REGULATIONS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 10 - SPORTFISHING REGULATIONS
State Regulations
§ 10.1 - Sportfishing Regulations
§ 10.2 - Boundary water fishing regulations
§ 10.3 - Additional special fishing regulations for certain inland waters
§ 10.4 - Ice fishing and use of tip-ups
§ 10.5 - Taking smelt or suckers with a scap or dip net
§ 10.6 - Prohibiting use of bait fish in specially designated lakes and ponds and their tributaries
§ 10.7 - Taking fish with bows and spears
§ 10.8 - Sportfishing regulations for certain privately managed fishing waters
§ 10.9 - Taking of anadromous river herring (alewife and blueback herring) in the hudson river and its tributaries and embayments

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
